reviews.review:
I use to play CS:GO since 2017, so i can say something about this GRAND game. As any player from 2017 or even 2018 i deem that, comparing with past versions of game present sucks. There are a couple of significant reasons that proof my mind.
First of all - cheaters. I really don't understand why Valve didn't even stabilizated situation with hackers from 2017, opposite - they had upgraded cheaters pool in game. Second reason is total monetization. Player skins?! WTF? I thought that CS:GO is enough self-sufficient to avoid stealing anything from fucking Fortnite!
  Summing up, i want say that i still beilive in light feuture for this game, beacause i really like it and i know, what Valve CAN.
